agents.anac.y2013.MetaAgent.portfolio.thenegotiatorreloaded

Class BidHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.anac.y2013.MetaAgent.portfolio.thenegotiatorreloaded.BidHistory

  • public class BidHistory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the bidding history of a negotiation agent.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BidHistory()
      Creates an empty bid history.
      BidHistory(java.util.ArrayList<BidDetails> bids)
      Creates a bid history given an array of bids offered by the negotiation agent.
      BidHistory(UtilitySpace utilSpace)
